NQ = raw_input("")
array = raw_input("")

nqArray = NQ.split(" ")
q = nqArray[1]
nos = [int(i) for i in array.split(" ")]

tests = []
for i in range(0,int(q)):
    tests.append(int(raw_input("")))

maxNo = max(nos)
minNo = min(nos)

for test in tests:
    if test <= maxNo and test >= minNo:
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")
